name: Arthved Foundation
briefDescription: Arthaved Foundation was formed in the year 2009 with noble objectives ofrural development to be performed in rural areas of Gujarat like education,health, women empowerment, consumer protection, entrepreneurshipdevelopment, environment, forestry, organic farming, and animal health.Having its office in Kapadvanj the organization is spreading activities in allTalukas of Kheda District .The organization envisages expanding its activities tomany more areas of Gujarat State.Vocational
